name: Mixty - Punks, Pets and Guns
description:
This is a survival game, the punk and the dog need to stay alive, fight and shoot in enemies to save both. 

Tips 
Press left shift when you control the punk to hit your enemies.
Hold left mouse to fight or shoot
Guns spawns in 30 seconds
Health in 25 seconds
Don't let punk or the dog alone in the main platform, you will die quickly.

Controls

Use mouse scroll to switch characters

While controlling the dog, press W  over the teleport panel you will send to background platform to collect health and ammo.

Controlling the punk press W on the vehicle you will send to background platform to collect new weapons.

Press S on teleport panel or vehicle to return to main platform.

Press Space to jumping.

Press LShift to dash.

Hold ou press left mouse button to fight or shoot.
